name: Diana Wagner
text:
During our travels through GA, NC and TN for 10 days, this was the most disappointing of all the restaurants we visited.
I understand that this Pandemic has got everyone set up in fear, and yes we need …More

name: Laura Heinl
text: Holy Shiitake pie and Buffalo chicken signature pizzas- wow, amazing flavors! Our new favorite.

name: Tracey Haynes
text: We had the best dining experience! We were waited on promptly and were seated where we requested.  The location and the view is just amazing. We both ordered calzones with a few additions and they were perfect and a very generous portion! It was delicious and a much needed break from home. Thank you especially to Dinah, our server!

name: Kathy Cooper
text: We love Mellow Mushroom pizza and usually can't wait to eat there.  On other occasions, we would have consistently given this place a 5 star review, but tonight was really pitiful.   The salad was fine, but the pizza was not good.  WHAT …More

name: Alexis Fuglsang
text: Amazing!! Mellow Mushroom usually provides a unique atmosphere and fantastic food as well, this location is a prime example of both. If I lived closer I'd definitely be a regular here!

name: ADRIAN VERMEIRE
text: We had a great experience at this location. They are always a solid choice whether your here or in Asheville, Charlotte locations as well. Really good food and appetizers especially the pretzel bites in beer cheese dip!

name: Breana Wallace
text: The pizza was delicious, the beer cheese was up to par with Helen, GA. The service was good, and we enjoyed the atmosphere of this little mountain town. Try the Cheerwine, it's a local thing.

name: Sara Jacobs
text: Great service. Beautiful building. Delicious food!

name: Clara Goh
text: Fair price for handmade pizza fresh out of their kitchen. Good pricing for the large pizzas, great for keeping within travel budget.

name: Alan K
text: If you've been to Mellow, you understand.  If you haven't, what are you waiting for?  Large Kosmic Karma, or perhaps Holy Shiitake, or a half & half: everyone wins!

name: Kevin Rayan
text: Too much of a good thing is not always the best thing. I like the place. I like the atmosphere and the service was great but the pizza? Not so much. Too much cheese and way too much pepperoni. I just asked for a regular pepperoni pizza. …More

name: Joe Irvin
text: Pizza was under cooked don't know if it was because of a busy night or just know know what they are doing.

name: Kait Earp
text: So, nobody can deny that their pizza is good- cause it is. But when we went, we were told that there would be a 30min wait for a table. They recommended that I place a to go order, as I had 2 hungry children with me, and said we would have …More

name: Katelyn Amick
text: Wonderful place to eat and work! Owned by a local family who are great people!

name: Steven Volbrecht
text: Awesome place to eat at! Had the funky q-chicken pizza and it was delicious! Service was very prompt and friendly. Highly recommend a visit here! Great selection of local beers on tap too

name: Ingrid Brown
text: Great mushroomgsrlic pizza.  Had a very long wait

name: Tonya Cruz
text: I love that I can always count on Mellow Mushroom to have vegan options for me. Each locale is differently decorated, usually by local artists. They are always very, fun, cool, and quirky! Their pizzas are delicious and their sandwiches and salads are fantastic as well!

name: Walter Norton
text: We were lucky today there were scattered showers at the Blowing Rock location and we showed up around 1:30pm and we were seated immediately. We started with spinach artichoke dip that was very creamy and tasty, we had a small pizza that was delicious! The staff were super friendly and safe!

name: Chic Lien
text: Great pizza but it took forever to get it. Wasn't that busy

name: Kathleen Savaria
text: 9 dollars each to see a natural rock formation   I don't think so Cisco😹

name: Mikeo.l Floyd
text: Grandkids favorite place to eat in Blowing Rock. Service was outstanding. Thank you, Margo!

name: YaoChih Chuang
text: "As so far the best pizza I ever had!" According to my wife who doesn't like pepperoni (salty taste), tomato sauce and pizza crust... somehow she really enjoyed the three kind what I mentioned above, definitely a must go when visit the beautiful town, and they're quite a few stores nearby for you to walk around as well.

name: Bobby McGhee
text: Service was excellent and food was spot on for a party of 8

name: Angelo Guercio
text: Very good Pretzel Bites.... even better Pizza!!

name: Rosa de la O
text: Pizza was amazing. Very nice service.

name: Matt Gates
text: The food and atmosphere was great here. Very relaxed and the server was very attentive. We stopped in on a Sunday afternoon after a hike to catch the Panthers game. My wife got the steak and cheese sandwich and I got a thin crust medium …More

name: Cristina Ungureanu
text: Great pizza and salad, nice selection of drinks  and we also loved the outdoors seating!

name: Michael Savaria
text: Amazing service and delicious pizza as always!  🙂🙂🙂

name: Mike Williams
text: Pizza was great and curbside pickup very efficient

name: Mother Nature
text: I liked the food and service and the tables were spread out for safety, but the vibes were off

name: Rhonda West
text: The food was delicious! Will definitely eat there again! Service was a bit absent. My husband's drink went dry a few times. But overall we enjoyed the atmosphere and food so much we will definitely visit again!

name: Josh Howard
text: The food was amazing and service was very nice, however, there was no good waiting area, always felt like I was in the way when people moved around, and, since it was a bit busy, I had to stand for about 30 minutes or so. But if you don't …More

name: Katie Hill
text: Excellent. Food and service were the best I've had in forever. We had a great waitress very helpful and attentive. She also recommended a wonderful place for dinner.  It's a must if you're in the area.

name: Dad saine
text: Pizza was great. Calzones were great

name: Jesse Zimmerman
text: The food and service was great!

name: Ann Rose
text: Good food and friendly servers.

name: Beach Bum 1977
text: The food and atmosphere at this location was UNREAL!!!!! Absolutely loved everything. The food was perfect, the staff were very friendly and the drinks were amazing. A definite must-do when visiting Blowing Rock.

name: Josh Benfield
text: Mellowed out there last night and had a great experience! Food was excellent as well as the service. My kids had a blast!

name: Joshua Clark
text: Gourmet pizza is always on point. If you prefer a hoagie over pizza they do not disappoint. Good draft craft beer selection. Staff always cheerful. Patio seating during nice weather is a plus! Highly recommend.

name: Rob Davis
text: Very good pizza, little pricey for a small($15) but good and service was mediocre.

name: Jennifer Stark
text: First time going there..... rain that night but riding in the train fun, pictures, carousel ride for kids, candy store, I think will go again next year.....

name: Alexandra Hofman
text: Despite being a chain of restaurants, Mellow Mushroom is still one of the best places to get Pizza in Boone and Blowing rock. I love the unique selection. I also love their drink menu!! The service at this location never fails.

name: Bob Smith
text: Didn't eat there, but the food sure did smell good. Owner is as solid as could be. Hard to find a better run establishment. If I ever find myself in Blowing Rock I'll definitely be back here for the friendly conversation.

name: Becky H
text: Good pizza, parking was tough.

name: Helen Washburn
text: Haven't been to a mellow in years. We each ordered a small pizza. Both were delicious. The crust was sooo good.

name: Diana Mcleod
text: Always good pizza!

name: Touron Touron
text: Good pizza, salad, and local beer

name: Karen S
text: Yum!!! The house pizza was delicious. And our kids really liked the calzones. Blowing Rock is a beautiful area & this location is so convenient right on main street. We will definitely be back again!

name: Nicholas Stockyj
text: Really cool place

name: Sophie McMillian
text: House salad was yummy. Pizza good, but the wait was long... even for a pick up order

name: Alexander D
text: Love the food, but on busy weekends expect to wait 1 hour for carry-out or to get seated

name: david autrey
text: Pizza has much improved in the last few months. After 5 years away I am back.

name: Muhammad Faisal
text: Wow lovely place in lovely town. Everything ordered as in pics and it was marvelous. Food ambience customer service everything was exceptional

name: S. Mark Tenen
text: So pedestrian. Not worth the effort or the wait.

name: cfausnet1
text: Great pizza. It's a little on the pricey side but they use high quality ingredients and its cooked in a stone oven if I'm not mistaken. The atmosphere is laid back and adventurous. Service is good as well.

name: Elena Lindemann
text: I didn't get the hype about this place. One needs to seriously think about the amount of fat he/she is putting into the body. Pizza does not have to be so unhealthy.

name: Jacques Farhi
text: Good pizza and service. Beer list is terrific as well.

name: D Michael Grey
text: Cool spot but very busy at peak times, great pizza and atmosphere.

name: Lisa Drake
text: We were hungry for pizza but this was more than just a pizza! Deeelicious!  Thin crust, sausage , extra cheese, peppers and mushrooms..YUMMY, GREAT service! Dog friendly.

name: Aislynn Denny
text: It's a tradition for our family to visit Mellow Mushroom when we go to the Boone/Blowing Rock area. It's always great food, friendly wait staff, and good atmosphere. The spinach salad I got this time was fantastic!

name: kim mendez
text: If your looking for great wings and kind staff Mellow is the right place!! The service at mellow mushroom are outstanding,They make sure that you are tended to and all of your hunger needs are perfectly met. If your looking for a …More

name: pam hassen
text: Excellent pizza with plenty of quality toppings.  Wait staff excellent.  We were there with 2 young grandchildren which can be extra work for wait staff.  Will definitely return when we visit blowing rock, nc again.

name: Jamie Martell
text: Delicious pizza, friendly staff

name: Brandie Davis
text: Great veggie calzones and pizza. Very friendly employees.

name: Ricky Loflin
text:
Mellow Mushroom has great pizza....Always a good experience....Will definitely go back
..

name: Cameron Fraser
text: Better than average pizza place with good pizza, but it is pretty pricey. I take the last star away because it didn't really stand out like many have suggested. Drinks are fantastic and staff is great as well, so it is a place worth stopping in to if in the area and in the mood for pizza.

name: Beau Clark
text: Long wait so we sat at the bar. Bartender Sam was very attentive and she took good care of us. Kitchen was backed up and slow but food - small greek salads, wings and meat balls were all delicious.

name: Megan Austin
text: Love the atmosphere. Great food great service

name: Mike Murrill
text: Way too much food😆

name: Darwin 1982
text: Excellent pizza good crust great flavor and  good services.

name: Lyn Walker
text: This is our favorite Mellow Mushroom. We go to the one at the beach, the one where my daughter lives and the one in our city but we like this one in Blowing Rock best.

name: Rachel Perkins Nobles
text: This place was so awesome! The pretzels were so good especially with the beer cheese sauce. Then the pizza was absolutely the best I've ever had. We drove 2 hours to eat here and yes it was well worth the drive. Certainly look forward to …More

name: Patti Franklin
text: Excellent service and food!

name: Cacanja Cowans
text: Hot wings & cold beer 👍🏾

name: Kristi Ennis Lail
text: Always great food. Even though it's a chain, the food is fresh, and the wait staff is generally fun college students! All together a great dining experience. Make sure to try the bruschetta!

name: Chris Wise
text: Great food. Staff is very sweet and kind. Never disappointed.

name: Robin Pait
text: The outdoor setting was really great. The parking was a bit of a hassle. Staff was amazing. Would go back

name: Anthony Abrugiato
text: The pizza was great and the service was wonderful! Our server was so nice!

name: Lana Kleeberg
text: Great food, great service ( we ate at the bar) perfect!

name: Todd Lapham
text: Nice small eating area. Pizza was very good. Split a House Pizza with my wife and it was tasty. Kids food was ok. The kids pizza was pretty lame as it was French bread with sauce and cheese.  The kids pretzel was just the pizza dough shaped like a pretzel. Beer was cold and the service was great.

name: Andrew Loccisano
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of our favorite restaurants. We've never been disappointed. This location was no exception. What an excellent meal with top-notch service. The bruschetta was perfect! So was the huge calzone & Greek salad!!

name: Terri Carlisle
text: Amazing food, great prices, fun staff

name: Sidney Wilson
text: Always great atmosphere and good food. This is a great restaurant and I've found all of the other Mellow Mushroom Restaurants to be the same. Treat yourself!

name: Tim Brock
text: Mellow Mushroom is always great pizza. The one in Blowing Rock, NC, is a must visit. Smaller and cozier than most but still great pizza. Friendly, great service also.

name: Calming Winds
text: Prob would give it 4.5 stars, cool atmosphere, good pizzas and very unique.

name: Thomas Knauf
text: Lost our order and made us wait

name: benjie guest
text: Good food

name: Carmen Albu
text: Excellent,  as always

name: Morgan Wright
text: Fantastic and warming atmosphere, delicious food and drinks! We were greeted promptly upon entering, and decided to sit at the bar. Both drinks we ordered were well made and we felt the worth the price. …More

name: Trisha Gensic
text: I finally found the best pizza I've ever eaten - and with 68+ years on me, I've got practice.  The awesome pizza is none other than their House Special with extra sauce.  It's good, fresh tasting, the most delectible ever!

name: Yolanda Leal
text: Was good! Is all about good pizza

name: Arnold Farmer
text: Beautiful friendly place really love going here thanks

name: Anna Stephanie
text: Love this place. Small and cozy. Great food

name: charles mckee
text: Order wasn't right but on time and good pizza.

name: Diane Poarch
text: Ordered a Caesar salad- plenty of dressing and delicious. Followed by 2 small pizzas- The Great White and the Buffalo Chicken. Both were excellent and we’re going to try to make the Buffalo Chicken at home!  Outstanding!  Great service, by the way.

name: Debra Harwell-Braun
text: Seats are open, but a 30 minute wait.  We got our appetizer the same time as the pizza. Veggie pizza was good.

name: Billy Williams
text: Seated right away. Waitress was wonderful. Food was exceptional. Great spot on Main Street Blowing Rock.

name: Joey Grissom
text: Very nice and unique restaurant. I would like to see a few more menu items but what they do is done well.

name: Katherine Turner
text: Great Pizza! Lots of toppings!! The boys were stuffed from the Mighty Meaty Pizza.

name: Vin Latus
text: Great pizza

name: Allen Price
text: Great atmosphere to dine in.

name: Sandra Possman
text: The Thai chili wings were great! I always enjoy everything I get at Mellow Mushroom. Like the Blowing Rock location best.

name: Laurel Lown
text: Perfect balance of service. Staff knowledgeable about foods (lactose intolerant) and attentive to needs. Popular place for dinner in town, crowded and long wait but worth the wait. Staff friendly and efficient. Enjoyed our time out for dinner.

name: Jane Lomax
text: Great downtown location in downtown Blowing Rock.  Good selection of IPAs and food was delicious.

name: tracy roberts
text: Large portions and great service.  Calzone wings are brownies for desert. Excellent all around.

name: Neerja N.
text:
Staff is very polite and friendly
Food quality is very nice.

name: Brittney Prestwood
text: Excellent!

name: Khristy Worthington
text: Super yummy food. Their wings appetizer and the spinach artichoke dip are a must. My favorite pizza is the cosmic karma(i believe i spelled that correctly) and they have a jerk chicken sub that is to die for.

name: John DBZFan Dula
text: Well worth the visit and I Totally advise taking a Visit there

name: Danielle Howard
text: Such a cool location! I love where they moved it. So nice, beautiful, and easy to get to. The staff is awesome and the food is always amazing!

name: Kenny Hopkins Jr.
text: I've been to a couple of these throughout the east coast and they always deliver a great quality pizza. Staff was friendly, waited by the bar for a togo order and had a tasty beverage.

name: Caleb Crowell
text: We always appreciate the level of customer service we receive when we eat at mellow mushroom. Thanks to the manager of this location this evening I went beyond what was expected. Thanks!

name: Jaime Rios
text: Amazing pizza! Hidden near Blowing Rock this hidden gem in the mountains is worth going to!

name: Fred Raalte
text: one excellent kitchen, a pallet of delicious flavors and exceptionally friendly staff, highly recommended!!💥💥💥💥

name: Donald Clifton
text: Great food good service. Remarkable location.

name: Talais
text: My families favorite place to stop for dinner on our way back down the mountain

name: Janie McRae
text: Can't get enough!!

name: Timothy Morris
text: AWESOME pizza!

name: Jorge Trak
text: Be prepared for long waiting times, the food is incredible and so it's the atmosphere they carry a great beer selection, the staff could be a little nicer

name: Kala Nagu
text:
Good place for pizza. Lots of draft beer collection.
Prices are slightly more and the taste is a lot.  better than chained pizzas.
It is spacious and the outdoor sitting area is really nice. We always prefer to sit outside. Service is decent. Overall it is better place than many other places.

name: wks
text: Service is a little slow, but very nice staff. Drinks were great; love the outdoor seating

name: Alex Cornwell
text: Expensive but that is a given, pizza was worth it

name: Bill Barrow
text: Truly Fantastic Pizza...get the Philosopher's Pie...

name: Mary Jernigan
text: Great, fresh food..outstanding service

name: Cindy Lee
text: Great wait staff, delicious food, yummy Margaritas!

name: Kim Broadhurst
text: My husband and I were visiting Blowing Rock for a weekend getaway. The restaurant was very busy so we opted to sit at the bar. They were clearly under staffed at the bar. The bar tender didn’t even make eye contact when we placed our order. …More

name: Sasha Elliott
text: First time visiting this location. The outside tables were empty, went in and requested to sit outside. There was some confusion between the timing for seating inside and seating outdoors. We were told it would …More

name: Rafael Cerna Jr.
text: Best Pizza Ever, From Miami to North Carolina...

name: Amanda Bush
text: Great food and atmosphere with wonderful service. The staff really hustles to provide great service despite the popularity and large crowds.

name: Ryan Nesbitt
text: Always great food and good service. Loud but I have kids so works for me.

name: A L I N A Nicoara
text: I love pizza and Mellow Mushroom! They have one of the best pizzas around!  This Mellow Mushroom is in beautiful Blowing Rock and is right on Main Street; therefore, it’s usually crowded but still worth the wait if you want great pizza 🍕 prices are on the high end! Service at this location is good!

name: Mark Williams
text: Really good pizza and a good gluten free option for a member of our party who is coeliac.

name: mary schott
text: Best ambiance,  best servers,  best pizza (white) anywhere

name: Julie Carpenter
text: Yummy pizza. Great beer and great server!

name: Nicholas 001
text: Really a great place busy at times but things move fast. Great food would recommend for all.

name: Timothy Lott
text:
I loved this place. It's really chill and laid back.. I was expecting it to be a little better.... But overall a good place.
I would definitely go back!

name: Erin Grant
text: Good food good service.

name: Marisa Sapanaro
text: Always great food and great service! Vegan options as well, which is a huge plus for me.

name: Sarah Ims
text: allergen friendly! both GF (Celiac safe) & dairy free options !!

name: Deborah Duke
text: The pizza was incredible and the staff was friendly and efficient!

name: Brandy Anderson
text: First time going. ❤😘 Loved it! Will definitely be back

name: Burks Hamner
text: Blowing Rock, had excellent service and a beautiful view of the Full Moon rising as we Dined on the patio.

name: Kyle Gorczynski
text: Great service and friendly waiters. We received the wrong meal at first (regular pizza when a member of our party needed gluten free) and they quickly brought out the correct meal and boxed up the regular pizza for us to take home. Win-win.

name: Max Porter
text: This was the fanciest looking mellow mushroom I've ever been to.

name: Kai Wulff
text: Good but not great

name: Hannah Jones
text: Amazing food

name: Matthew Keyworth
text: Food was good, but the service was slow on getting a table and refilling our drinks!

name: Mary ash
text: Great service, awesome pizza..

name: Alan Courtney
text: Place was packed with Blue Ridge Relay participants and loud. Service was excellent. Pizza was very good. Waitstaff did a fantastic job.

name: Clifton Thomas
text: Great food and service was excellent!

name: Mark Williams
text: Excellent options for vegetarian and even some vegan choices

name: Edwin Dávila
text: Good hospitality and good beer selection, but the wings were overcooked, and the Teriaky Chicken Sanndwich I had was too salty. Not going back!

name: Jessica Gibson
text: Great service,  delicious food!

name: Tammy Mcmillan
text: Great pizza, great redo of a service station. Beautiful place to eat.

name: GDADDY CHUCK
text: Their portobello mushroom pizza was Fantastic & the young man who served was awesome too...

name: Blue MountainCur
text: Great pet friendly crew! Comfortable outside eating, good brew selection If ya want a great meal, just a wee bit pricey, this is the place. The rose bushes on the porch are a bit rough, but this is the price you'll pay for good grub these days.

name: Phil Gainey
text: Delicious pizza, lots of variety, and great atmosphere! This location is also a historical building; check the sign outside!

name: Lori Van Pelt
text: Great pizza!!

name: Betty Ann Korzenny
text: Great pizza. Charming small town.

name: Kathleen Conner
text: I had a great lunch here! I had gluten free vegan pizza and a salad. I have Celiac Disease and they seem well educated on how to handle my food so I won't get cross contaminated. I had a delicious meal and did not get sick!

name: James Fetner
text: The food was great, but I called and placed the order at 6:41 pm on a Friday night. I was told it would take 30 or 35 minutes. I arrived about 7:00 pm and waited patiently because they were obviously very busy. I paid and waited about 10 …More

name: Peeb
text: I have been to other mellow mushrooms before, but this one is by far the best! The restraunt it self is a great atmosphere and perfectly fits blowing rock. The staff are very friendly and the service is quick. The pizza is some of the best I've ever had!

name: Joshua Snyder
text: By far the best of this chain I have ever been to!  Them fellas in the kitchen got it down. I was very impressed!

name: Rodney Hall
text: Small dining area,  decent food.  Parking on the street

name: S B
text: We love Mellow Mushroom at any location but this one is special because it is in downtown Blowing Rock.  It is within blocks from the three hotels where we normally stay.  It has wonderful salads if you are wanting healthy.  However, if you …More

name: Stephanie Ramsey
text: We love this place. Recommend anytime!

name: Bruce Tyndall
text: Pizza was very good. Service was fine. Price was right. It's too bad. The restaurant  was empty, only 3 tables occupied  and I counted 1 order to go.

name: Brian B
text: Great location on main street Blowing Rock.  I've been to several Mellow Mushroom locations and all have been consistently good and this location is just as fun and unique!  The food and service are exceptional.  My wife had their "small" …More

name: Nick Bailey
text: Good food and people.

name: Steve Browning
text: If you have one of these in your area try it.  Great pizza great atmosphere.

name: Grace Markel
text: Always on the mark.

name: Anthony Hawks
text: Great pizza they dont skimp on the toppings very pleassnt atmosphere

name: Bruce Rector
text: Good pizza with lots of choices and good selection of beers. Service was very good.

name: Rodney Baucom
text: Loved the new location.  Waitress was very friendly, accommodated a pizza with two slices of one set of toppings with balance a different set.  Great atmosphere, definitely recommend!

name: Jenny Nardone
text: Pizza was one of best i have had. Staff was super friendly. We will be back!

name: Will Williams
text: Probably the best "Mellow" I've tried, as far as pizza quality and taste.  The new Blowing Rock location is awesome and really has a true Blowing Rock vibe.  Our fave is to grab it to go and go eat in the city park to enjoy Blowing Rock from it's heart.

name: Belle
text: Excellent pizza.  Good rotating draught selection.  Servers very knowledgeable concerning beer choices, types, tastes.  TV at bar and in dining area - sports - and if what you want to see isn't on simply make the request.  They are …More

name: Christine Deshazo
text: Always a wonderful meal and drinks.

name: Shaun Newton
text: Good food and great staff!!

name: Tiffany Hudgins
text: Great food and service.

name: wade saine
text: Great pizza. New young waiter. He was very confused. We had to ask him for everything and chase him down. He was not ready to solo yet can't believe they let him do it by himself.  He was so involved in other things he forgot his main job of taking our order,refills,and getting our check.

name: Tom Knotts
text: Love the food and atmosphere

name: Napier Minor
text: Great pizza, great beer, really hit the spot.

name: Mark Calvert
text: Great service, high quality food, happy, boisterous atmosphere

name: Curtis Winter
text: Relaxing atmosphere, great background music!👍

name: Just SomeGuy
text: Great food, vegetarian options, no hurry

name: TAMMY JONES
text: Food was ok.waiter didn't seem to care if we were there or not

name: Dawn Simms
text: Amazing...food was great and staff was beyond amazing. I can not wait to come back.

name: Carole Marmorato
text: Great service and good food (meatball hoagie on pita bread).

name: simon stickel
text: 40 minutes to heat up a single slice of pizza and they still got it wrong. 4 servers standing around and 2 tables occupied in the restaurant you would think service and food preparation would be quick. Time was noon on a weekday

name: Mariana Rodríguez Serrano
text: Awesome place to visit while at Blowing Rock. Delicious pizza and super friendly service. It is also downtown so you can walk around either before or after and have a great time with great food!

name: Tom Matlock
text: Yummy food (esp the pretzels). Good service. Love the small town, everyone’s a local feel.

name: Robert Livesay
text: I spent 27$ on a medium pizza, it made me sick

name: Barleywine14
text: This is the best Mellow Mushroom in the area. Their food is great. I usually get the garlic butter pretzels and a small chef salad but the pizza is great too. The service is always top notch here too.

name: Jamie Bader
text: Always great food!

name: Christopher Reimer
text: First Off. It's Mellow Mushroom. In Blowing Rock. Came in about 8ish and has a 45 min wait. No big deal. They have a bar so you can get your drinks. And a nice little patio and small waiting area up front. I believe it's Linton was our …More

name: Glynna Goss
text: This facility is definitely one of the nicer ones. It's pretty small. Only about 10 to 15 tables. The bar is large with a large selection of beer. They are fast. We come here 3 or 4 times a year and drive in from Lenoir for our Christmas tree , Christmas parade, 4th of july, and usually 1 or 2 times just because.

name: Gabriel Sanchez
text: If I ever came back to NC I would eat here again 100%

name: Jamie Abernathy
text: We love the atmosphere and the pizza is amazing!

name: Anne Bowen
text: I have to put one star but make sure your name is actually on the wait list the hostess are completely clueless or better yet go to a different Mellow Mushroom

name: Larry Cartner
text: Good pizza and prompt service.

name: Jennifer Johnson
text: Great pizza, fun location!

name: Nicole Moston
text: Great pizza and location in heart of Blowing Rock!!

name: Jean Parker
text: Very good gluten free pizza  available.

name: carol tedder
text: They were fairly busy but our server was very preoccupied with her other tables.Maybe because We were only ordering an appetizer and drinks...too bad,because we tip VERY well. We were ignored and had to go to the bar to get our own drinks.

name: Ken Carpenter
text: Cute place. Wait staff was very attentive and took good care of us. We had pizza, mushroom soup, wings, and a greek salad among the table. Food was very good. Good selection of beer. I recommend this restaurant for lunch or dinner.

name: Julia Rodriguez
text: Very tasty pizza, the salad good as well  and the service was excellent, and the decor is really nice, very unique, come and see it for your self just be prepared to spend some money.

name: david blankenship
text: Great food and service

name: Betsy Brisendine
text: Great place for a pizza. Plenty of vegan & vegetarian options too! I'll be back.

name: Jessica Dick
text: Visited the Blowing Rock location with some friends and was served by Lynton! He was so kind and very attentive! The pizza was the best I've ever eaten and we will be coming back!!!!!!

name: Paxton Hix
text: Food was great as always, servers were a little rude and not willing to help out when not helping other customers

name: AR S.
text: Great pizza and wings. Nice staff, cool location up in Blowing Rock

name: Anita Burleson
text: Great pizza.  The bread sticks are terrific too

name: Barry Winecoff
text: Great food .. Attentive staff. .. I definitely will come back to Mellow Mushroom

name: Hubert van der Harst

name: Lee Summers
text: Great place to go. Great and friendly employees, always wanting to help and kind. Probably the BEST pizza you will find anywhere. Check out some of their slightly different pizza options! Don't forget their calzones or salads either!

name: Jesse Williamson
text: The pizza itself is only ok; very greasy and very overpriced. The staff is friendly and the menu does have several options, but on the many occasions I've had pizza from here it just simply is not worth the money you pay. Even if you split …More

name: Just Me
text:
The food was decent,and it has a great atmosphere.
I've been in NC for 10 years,and have always wanted to visit The Mellow mushroom, and I guess I was expecting the food to be outstanding. I was a little disappointed, it was good, but not as good as I expected.

name: Jason Tilley
text: Great pizza as always. Bought my picky, bitchy dad some. He loved the mellow(Mediterranean) pizza. Convenient and in town. Perfect. …More

name: Karla Aponte
text: Pizza is great, friendly service. Restaurant is cozy and the decoration is cool, but it is small so if you don't want to wait avoid busy times like Friday night and Saturday. You can always carry out which is another option if it's busy. Eating at the bar is another alternative.

name: Thomas Vincent
text: Food and service were great...would definitely go back

name: David Hammermann

name: ali james
text: The employees and overall business at this location are a sorry excuse for a Mellow Mushroom. As an avid Mellow lover, I left this location beyond unhappy. The food? Well, what wasn't 45+ late, came burnt. Beer? Out of almost everything. …More

text: My husband and I celebrated our 15th wedding anniversary yesterday with a nice, long hike off the Blue Ridge Parkway and then dinner on the outdoor patio of Mellow Mushroom in Blowing Rock. As always, their Funky Q pizza was delicious! Love the new  Blowing Rock 'Shroom location, too!

name: Erica Brinker
